metadata.title: USN-7002-1 -- Setuptools vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that setuptools was vulnerable to remote code execution. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7002-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  pypy-pkg-resources - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm1 pypy-setuptools - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm1 python-pkg-resources - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm1 python-setuptools - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm1 python2-setuptools-whl - 44.1.1-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro  python-setuptools-doc - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.2 python3-pkg-resources - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.2 python3-setuptools - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.2 python3-setuptools-whl - 59.6.0-1.2ubuntu0.22.04.2 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
